creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: man in profile with wrinkled face wearing suit and black bow tie, with his arm around a short nude woman with blue short hair, standing on a curved balcony overlooking barren landscape with silo-like forms with a brown road; mountain peak in background; cloud with lightning bolts; tan lizard and cactus on balcony; music notes and treble clefs with "Another Time / Another Place" in doorway at right

title: Another Time Another Place
